byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Stockholm Aftonbladet repts 4 or 5 German ships sunk in Kattegat battle

headline.main: 2 PLANE CARRIERS BOMBED, NAZIS SAY; Other British Craft Reported Hit Off Norway--German Air Bases Attacked

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, May 2--British naval units approaching Norway's west coast yesterday were seriously damaged by German bombers, it was reported here tonight. Two aircraft carriers and a destroyer were hit, it was claimed, and one of the aircraft carriers was seen to be afire.
